bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to the Adjutant General, February 17, 1876

div1.p: Reed acknowledges the receipt of his commission as Assistant Surgeon, U.S. Army, February 17, 1876.

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to the Adjutant General, February 17, 1876
div1.opener:
Willet's Point, N.Y. H.
February 17th 1876.
742 A.C.P. 76
Reed, Walter,
Ass't. Surg. U.S.A.
Filed with 2959 A.C.P1880
Acknowledging the
receipt of his com-
mission as Assistant
Surgeon, U.S.A.
Noted C.B.
Rec'd, A.G.O. Feb. 19, 1876
Willet's Point,
New York Harbor,
February 17, 76.
To
The Adjutant General, U.S.A.
Washington, D.C.,
Sir:
div1.p:
I have the honor, herewith, to
acknowledge the receipt of my
commission as Ass't. Surgeon,
U.S. Army.
div1.closer:
Very respectfully,
Your Ob't. Serv't, Walter Reed, Ass't. Surg. U.S.A.
